sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./home.css"; import authai from "../../src/assets/images/authai.svg"; import glob from "../../src/assets/images/glob.svg"; import three from "../../src/assets/images/three.svg"; import twentyseven from "../../src/assets/images/twentyseven.svg"; import ArrowForwardIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ArrowForward"; const Home = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [filter, setFilter] = useState("All"); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/products") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setProduct(data.products[0]); // Display the first product setLoading(false); }) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching product data:", error)); }, []); return (

About Glamy

View all
  • Authenticated by Experts & AI
  • Global Sourcing
  • 3-Day Returns
  • Customer Service

    • Recommended

    setFilter("All")}> All
    setFilter("Adidas")}> Adidas
    setFilter("Nike")}> Nike
    setFilter("Gucci")}> Gucci
    {loading ? (

    Loading products...

    ) : ( product && (

    {product.name}

    Brand: {product.brand}

    Price: ${product.price}{" "} ${product.final_price}

    Discount: {product.discount}

    Rating: {product.rating} ⭐ ({product.reviews_count} reviews)

    {product.stock ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"}

    Specifications:

    • Color: {product.specifications.color}
    • Size: {product.specifications.size}
    • Material: {product.specifications.material}
    • Warranty: {product.specifications.warranty}
    ) )}
    ); }; export default Home;
